Camden.Gloucester City Junior-Senior High Schoo:
Gloucester City Junior-Senior High School is a comprehensive six-year community public high school that is based in Gloucester City, New Jersey, United States, serving students from seventh through twelfth grade as the lone secondary school of the Gloucester City Public Schools, an Abbott district.
As of the 2015-16 school year, the school had an enrollment of 786 students and 73.8 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 10.7:1. There were 462 students (58.8% of enrollment) eligible for free lunch and 83 (10.6% of students) eligible for reduced-cost lunch.
